SELECT t2.tenant_id,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t3.pool_name,t3.username,t3.`password`,t3.db_type,t3.driver_class_name,t3.`database`,t3.connection_type,t3.`host`,t3.`port` FROM t_tenant t1 JOIN t_tenant_config t2 ON t1.id = t2.tenant_id JOIN t_dynamic_datasource t3 ON t2.dynamic_datasource_id = t3.id WHERE t1.locked = 0 and t1.deleted = 0 and t2.deleted = 0 and t3.deleted = 0
and t3.id = #{datasourceId}

SELECT t2.tenant_id,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t3.pool_name,t3.username,t3.`password`,t3.db_type,t3.driver_class_name,t3.`database`,t3.connection_type,t3.`host`,t3.`port` FROM t_tenant t1 JOIN t_tenant_config t2 ON t1.id = t2.tenant_id AND t2.deleted = 0 JOIN t_dynamic_datasource t3 ON t2.dynamic_datasource_id = t3.id WHERE t1.locked = 0 and t1.deleted = 0 and t2.deleted = 0 and t3.deleted = 0 AND t1.id = #{tenantId}
